jp_text: 思い出しちまった  あのリレーのこと

en_text: Rin, you...
jp_text: 凛さん　あなたは…

en_text: I'm going to swim in Samezuka's relay.
jp_text: 俺は鮫柄で　リレーを泳ぐ
google_translated: I swim the relay with a bag

en_text: I'm going to show you how good I can be.
jp_text: そこで最高の泳ぎを見せてやる
google_translated: I will show you the best swimming there

en_text: So do the best you can with Haru and your other teammates.
jp_text: だからお前も自分のチームで　ハル達と精一杯やれ
google_translated: So you can do Hull and Cup with your own team

en_text: That's all I have to say.
jp_text: それだけだ　呼び出して悪かったな

en_text: Make us feel the splash
jp_text: make us freeなsplash! 重ねた光のコントラスト浴びて

en_text: Be ready for love
jp_text: 思うように

en_text: Kick as suits you
I want to feel the pool
jp_text: 掴みたいんだ

en_text: I can feel the butterfly
jp_text: back&fill なバタフライ

en_text: Our chances of winning are based on trial and error
jp_text: 試行錯誤の勝率は
google_translated: The winning rate of trial and error is

en_text: Let's jump in later
jp_text: 潤して

en_text: Our throat is wet
jp_text: 後でいいだろ

en_text: Let's do something leisure mode
Show your heart
Look hard at summer
jp_text: いつまでも終わらない夏に目を凝らして
google_translated: Eye in summer not ending forever

en_text: Be ready for love, love
jp_text: 思い思いに

en_text: I held out my hand and felt the splashes
Welcome back.
jp_text: お帰りなさい　先輩

en_text: He probably wants to talk about the relay tomorrow.
jp_text: きっと明日のリレーのことですよ
google_translated: I'm sure about the relay of tomorrow

en_text: What?
jp_text: 何か　あったんですか

en_text: This will be our lineup for the relay tomorrow.
jp_text: 明日のリレーはそのメンバーでいく
google_translated: Tomorrow's relay goes with the member

en_text: You can focus on the 100m free.
jp_text: お前はフリーの百だけに集中しろ
google_translated: You are concentrated on your free one hundred

en_text: You haven't paid any attention to your own relay team.
jp_text: お前は自分のリレーチームを見ていない
google_translated: You are not watching your relay team

en_text: I'm sending our best members out there.
jp_text: ハル　覚えてる

en_text: That's what a team should do.
jp_text: ベストメンバーで試合に挑む  チームとしては当然の選択だ
google_translated: It is a natural choice as a team to challenge the game with the best member

en_text: You're not at your best condition right now.
jp_text: 今のお前のコンディションはベストじゃない
google_translated: Your condition is not the best

en_text: You can't...
jp_text: そんな…

en_text: Haru, do you remember the first time we ran into Rin at a tournament?
jp_text: 初めて凛と会った大会の日のこと
google_translated: The day of the tournament meeting for the first time

en_text: Yeah, we've come a long way since then.
jp_text: ちょっと　何しんみりしてるのさ　ハルちゃんもマコちゃんも
google_translated: I'm a little dent, Haru-chan, Mako-chan

en_text: That's right. We still have a long way to go.
jp_text: そうですよ　僕達はこれからまだまだもっと遠くまで行くんですから
google_translated: Yes, we will still go far from now on

en_text: Next time: "Distant Free!"
jp_text: 次回　遥かなるフリー！
